contentList.content: Drink to increase the effectiveness of your spells. You will gain [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_ACUITY">Arcane Acuity</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_CHARGE">Arcane Charge</LSTag>. Replaces effects from other elixirs when drunk.

Affected entity has <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_ACUITY">Arcane Acuity</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_CHARGE">Arcane Charge</LSTag> until its next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>. Replaces effects from other elixirs when drunk.

Drink to enter a bloodlust. Once per turn when you kill a foe, you gain [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> and you may make a melee attack with your main hand weapon as a bonus action. Replaces effects from other elixirs when drunk.

Affected entity has entered a murderous state of bloodlust. Once per turn, when it kills an enemy, it gains [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> and may make a melee attack with their main hand weapon as a bonus action. Replaces effects from other elixirs when drunk.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> by 4, to a maximum of 28.
